qrList.label: New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type
qrList.message:
/extension-exists SillyTavern-LALib | /setvar key=lalib {{pipe}}|
/if else={: /popup The Extension LALib is needed for this to work. :} left=lalib right=true rule=eq {:
  /extension-state SillyTavern-LALib | /setvar key=laliben {{pipe}}|
  /if else={: /popup The Extension LALib needs to be enabled for this to work. :} left=laliben right=true rule=eq {:
    /:"Character Maker V4.New Char"
  :}|
:}|

qrList.label: Character Generator Swipe
qrList.message:
/setvar key=t {{lastmessage}}|
/re-replace replace="" find="/Character Maker QR: /g" {{getvar::t}} | /setvar key=p {{pipe}} |
/re-replace replace="" find="/(?<=<\/h2>)([\s\S]*)/g" {{getvar::p}} | /setvar key=d {{pipe}} |
/try {:
	/swipes-add {{getvar::d}}|
	/setvar key=swipe Yes|
	/setvar key=new No|
:}|
/catch  {:
	/setvar key=d "<h2 align='center'>Basic Information"|
	/setvar key=swipe No|
	/setvar key=new Yes|
:}|




/ife ( 'Basic Information' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.01. Generate Basic Information (form)"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Appearance Info' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple)"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Personality Traits And Quirks' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Character\'s Relation to user' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.04. Character's Relation to user"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Relationship Information' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.05. Generate Relationship Information"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Known Kinks' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.06. Generate Known Kinks"|
:}|
/elseif ( 'Latent Kinks' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.07. Generate Latent Kinks"|
:}|
/elseif ( 'Outfit and Gear' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple)"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Background Info' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.09. Generate Background Info"
:}|
/elseif  'Interaction Style' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.10. Generate Interaction Style"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Contextual Information' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.11. Generate Contextual Information"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Additional Notes' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.12. Generate Additional Notes"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Spells and Abilities' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.13. Generate Spells and Abilities"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Character Rules' in d){:
	/echo Rules does nothing with a swipe. Insted Edit it manualy and add/remove rules to your liking.|
	/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Extras' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.15. Generate Extras"
:}|
/elseif ( 'Scenario' in d){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.16. Generate Scenario"
:}|
/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"

qrList.label: Generate Character Choice
qrList.message:
/setvar key=qr Character Maker V4.|
/buttons labels=["01. Generate Basic Information (form)","02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple)","03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks","04. Character's Relation to user","05. Generate Relationship Information","06. Generate Known Kinks","07. Generate Latent Kinks","08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple)","09. Generate Background Info","10. Generate Interaction Style","11. Generate Contextual Information","12. Generate Additional Notes","13. Generate Spells and Abilities","14. Copy Character Rules","15. Generate Extras","16. Generate Scenario"] What do you want to do?|
/setvar key=choice {{pipe}}|

/setvar key=new Yes|
/setvar key=swipe No|

/ife ( choice == ''){:
	/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"|
	/echo Aborting | /abort
:}|

/addvar key=qr {{getvar::choice}}|

/:{{getvar::qr}}|
/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"

qrList.label: Debug On/Off
qrList.message:
/extension-exists SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer | /setvar key=stvv {{pipe}}|
/ife ( stvv != true ) {:
  /echo The extention SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer is reccomended
:}|
/else {:
  /extension-state SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer| /setvar key=stvven {{pipe}}|
  /ife ( stvven != true ){:
    /echo The extention SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer needs to be enabled to work.
  :}|
  else {:
    /variableviewer
  :}|
:}|

/ife (debug != 'Yes' ){:
	/setvar key=debug Yes|
	/echo Debug Enabled
:}|
/else {:
	/setvar key=debug No|
	/echo Debug Disabled
:}|
/flushvar stvv|
/flushvar stvven
